attributes.action: make more NHS eating disorder services available in kent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in kent and in particular, canterbury, there is hardly any support for those with eating disorders. i have also heard that due to lack of funding, you have to have a BMI of 17.5 or under to gain access to treatment. i am in the healthy weight range but have an eating disorder and wish to have treatment but there is nothing in my area. make these services available and save lives.
